); } // onEditAvatar = handleEditAvatarClick // onEditProfile = handleEditProfileClick // onAddPlace = handleAddPlaceClick function handleEditAvatarClick() { const popupAvatar = document.querySelector(".popup_avatar"); popupAvatar.classList.add("popup_opened"); } function handleEditProfileClick() { const popupProfile = document.querySelector(".popup_profile"); popupProfile.classList.add("popup_opened"); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { const popupCard = document.querySelector(".popup_card"); popupCard.classList.add("popup_opened"); } // const isEditProfilePopupOpen = // const isAddPlacePopupOpen = // const isEditAvatarPopupOpen = export default App;
